actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-10.

official_title: A resolution creating a select committee to be known as the Select Committee on the House Restaurant.

summary.text: Creates a select committee to be known as the Select Committee on the House Restaurant. Provides that such committee shall exercise direction and supervision over the management and operation of the House Restaurant, the cafeteria, and other food service facilities of the House, subject to the authority of the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: A resolution creating a select committee to be known as the Select Committee on the House Restaurant.
